categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Veda was a Force-sensitive female Jedi Initiate studying within the Jedi Order during the Clone Wars. At a young age, Veda was identified and inducted into the Jedi Order and began her studies in the ways of the Force at the Jedi Temple on the Republic's capital world, Coruscant. In 19 BBY, Veda and her clan were passing down a corridor at the temple, when she recognized Jedi Master Mace Windu passing by and went to him to ask the senior Jedi a "very important question," much to the distress of her instructor.
Veda was created by author Elizabeth Hand for Boba Fett: Pursuit, a young readers' novel published in December 2004.
